de.targodan.usb.io

Interface IRCClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Hexchat, mIRC

    public interface IRCClient
    IRCClient represents a supported IRC client. The implementations of this interface should be able to detect whether the client is installed and ideally where the fuelrats log file is located.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.nio.charset.Charset getDefaultLogFileEncoding()
      GetDefaultLogFileEncoding returns the default charset for log files.
      java.lang.String getFuelratsLogfilePath()
      GetFuelratsLogfilePath should return the path for the fuelrats log file.
      Marshaller getMarshaller()
      GetMarshaller should return a Marshaller that is able to marshal the log files of this client.
      java.lang.String getName()
      GetName returns the name of the client.
      java.util.Set<OperatingSystem> getSupportedOperatingSystems()
      GetSupportedOperatingSystems returns a set of operating systems that are supported by the IRC client.
      boolean isInstalled()
      IsInstalled should check whether or not the client is installed.

    • Method Detail

      • isInstalled

        boolean isInstalled()
        IsInstalled should check whether or not the client is installed.
        Returns:
        true if the IRC client is installed.

      • getFuelratsLogfilePath

        java.lang.String getFuelratsLogfilePath()
        GetFuelratsLogfilePath should return the path for the fuelrats log file.
        Returns:
        the filepath of the default logfile of the #fuelrats channel.

      • getMarshaller

        Marshaller getMarshaller()
        GetMarshaller should return a Marshaller that is able to marshal the log files of this client.
        Returns:
        the marshaller to be used for marshalling.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        GetName returns the name of the client.
        Returns:
        the name of the client.

      • getSupportedOperatingSystems

        java.util.Set<OperatingSystem> getSupportedOperatingSystems()
        GetSupportedOperatingSystems returns a set of operating systems that are supported by the IRC client.
        Returns:
        a set of operating systems that are supported by the IRC client.

      • getDefaultLogFileEncoding

        java.nio.charset.Charset getDefaultLogFileEncoding()
        GetDefaultLogFileEncoding returns the default charset for log files.
        Returns:
        the default charset for log files.
